statements: SELECT * FROM transport_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email, average_rating FROM transport_vendors;
SELECT contact_person_name, phone_number FROM transport_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM transport_vendors ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, transport_type FROM transport_vendors WHERE average_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM transport_vendors WHERE transport_type = 'Truck' ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM transport_vendors WHERE average_rating > 4;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person_name, phone_number FROM transport_vendors WHERE vendor_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transport_vendors WHERE average_rating BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM transport_vendors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferred_transport_vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM preferred_transport_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM preferred_transport_vendors;
SELECT * FROM preferred_transport_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM preferred_transport_vendors WHERE contact_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM preferred_transport_vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person FROM preferred_transport_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM preferred_transport_vendors WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, negotiation_date, negotiation_amount FROM preferred_transport_vendors JOIN negotiation_rates ON preferred_transport_vendors.vendor_id = negotiation_rates.vendor_id;

SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, negotiation_date, negotiation_amount FROM negotiation_rates JOIN preferred_transport_vendors ON preferred_transport_vendors.vendor_id = negotiation_rates.vendor_id ORDER BY negotiation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transport_vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person FROM transport_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM transport_services WHERE service_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM negotiated_rates WHERE negotiated_rate > 1000 ORDER BY negotiated_rate DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM transport_vendors JOIN transport_services ON transport_vendors.vendor_id = transport_services.vendor_id WHERE transport_services.service_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transport_vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'ABC Transport'
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, email FROM transport_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM negotiated_rates WHERE negotiated_rate >= 100.00 AND expiration_date IS NULL
SELECT service_name, service_description, vendor_name FROM transport_services JOIN transport_vendors ON transport_services.vendor_id = transport_vendors.vendor_id
SELECT MAX(negotiated_rate) AS max_rate, MIN(negotiated_rate) AS min_rate FROM negotiated_rates
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, description, category FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, unit_price FROM vendors INNER JOIN price_lists ON vendors.vendor_id = price_lists.vendor_id;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products INNER JOIN price_lists ON products.product_id = price_lists.product_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description, category FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name, unit_price FROM vendors v INNER JOIN price_lists p ON v.vendor_id = p.vendor_id ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM price_lists WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT v.vendor_name, p.product_name, n.negotiated_price FROM vendors v JOIN price_lists p ON v.vendor_id = p.vendor_id JOIN negotiations n ON p.price_id = n.price_id WHERE n.negotiation_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM preferred_transport_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM preferred_transport_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM preferred_transport_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM negotiation_history WHERE negotiated_amount > 5000;
SELECT vendor_id, metric_date, on_time_delivery_rate FROM performance_metrics WHERE on_time_delivery_rate < 95 ORDER BY on_time_delivery_rate ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM preferred_transport_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT option_name, base_rate FROM transportation_options WHERE base_rate > 1000;
SELECT negotiation_id, negotiation_date, negotiated_amount FROM negotiation_history WHERE negotiated_amount >= 500;
SELECT contract_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date, contract_terms FROM contract_details WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT metric_id, metric_date, on_time_delivery_rate, cost_savings FROM performance_metrics WHERE vendor_id = 2;
